setting.name: owm_locationId
setting.description: The LocationId from the OWM documentation. Default is Los Angeles.

setting.name: owm_updateInterval
setting.description: How often should the weather be updated in seconds. Free account has max 60 requests per minute. I chose a weird number so the players wont feel the interval that easy. In the price list it says: Weather API data update in less than 2h, so I assume you could set a higher value.

setting.name: owm_units
setting.description: Set to metric for celsius or imperial for fahrenheit
